item.title: Big changes are being proposed for a US food aid program. Here's a breakdown by the numbers
item.description: Big changes are being are being proposed to a food aid program as part of President Donald Trump's tax-cut legislation

item.title: What's targeted in Trump's request for $9.4 billion in budget cuts from Congress
item.description: President Donald Trump is looking to cancel $9.4 billion in spending already approved by Congress

item.title: Trump plans to attend 'Les Misérables' at the Kennedy Center after taking over the institution

item.title: Veterans are divided over the Army's big parade, being held on Trump's birthday
item.description: The upcoming parade in Washington to celebrate the U.S. Army's 250th anniversary has divided veterans

item.title: Lawyers for a South Carolina inmate ask a court to stop his execution
item.description: Lawyers for a South Carolina death row inmate are heading to federal court to argue that the state is not properly carrying out executions
